content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, let me first stress that as the landlord, my goal here is to secure the highest possible rental price for the property. However, since we're currently discussing only the rental price without getting into lease terms or utility costs, I'll entertain your negotiations with an open mind. Now, please propose a price for the apartment rental. If we reach an agreement, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should you or I desire to end the negotiation, I'll provide a reason for doing so. If we fail to agree on a price, negotiations will simply terminate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Schmidt, the apartment is in a great location and condition, so I think the price of 700 Euros per month is reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I aim for a higher rental price given the apartment's desirability and my objectives as a landlord. However, I'm open to hearing other potential offers from you or considering alternative terms that could benefit me while remaining reasonable for you. If you have any adjustments or alternative proposals, please share them.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Schmidt, I understand your situation. Given the apartment's location and condition, I am willing to increase my offer to 750 euros per month. This is the highest I can afford, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your flexibility and increased offer of 750 Euros per month, I must push a little further in pursuit of the highest possible rental income. Let me counter with a proposal of 800 Euros, which I believe is a fair compromise considering the apartment's advantages. If you're willing to accept this amount, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where [x] is the agreed number. Should you need more time to consider or wish to negotiate further, feel free to propose another figure or discuss alternative terms.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Hello Mr. Schmidt, I have carefully considered your proposal and I am willing to accept your offer of 800 euros per month.

[Your response]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euro!
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
